mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bird_user ( userId, sex, nianling, userType, school, xueyuan, province, city, signImg, createTime, updateTime ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{sex}, #{nianling}, #{userType}, #{school}, #{xueyuan}, #{province}, #{city}, #{signImg}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bird_user WHERE 1 = 1 AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE bird_user SET sex = #{sex}, nianling = #{nianling}, userType = #{userType}, school = #{school}, xueyuan = #{xueyuan}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, signImg = #{signImg}, updateTime = #{updateTime} WHERE id =#{id}
